    • allowWorkerAccess

      public AuthorizationRangeResponseDto allowWorkerAccess(Long workerId, String comment)
      Allows access for a worker by creating an authorization request.
      Specified by:
      allowWorkerAccess in interface WorkerService
      Parameters:
      workerId - ID of the worker requesting access.
      comment - Comment associated with the authorization request.
      Returns:
      AuthorizationRangeResponseDto containing the client response.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the worker is not found.
      WorkerNotAvailableException - if the worker is not available to work.

    • unassignWorkerFromConstruction

      public void unassignWorkerFromConstruction(Long workerId)
      Unassigns a worker from a construction project. This method removes the construction assignment from the worker by setting the worker's construction field to null.
      Specified by:
      unassignWorkerFromConstruction in interface WorkerService
      Parameters:
      workerId - the ID of the worker to unassign.
